Simple HTTP Load tester
=======================

**I am a prototype**


::

    $ pip install boom
    $ boom http://localhost:80 -c 10 -n 10
    Server Software: nginx/1.2.2
    Starting the load [====================================================================================================] Done

    -------- Results --------
    Successful calls        100
    Average                 0.0263 s
    Fastest                 0.0126 s
    Slowest                 0.0307 s
    Amplitude               0.0181 s
    RPS                     343
    BSI                     Pretty good
